alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middleburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Middleburg, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Switzerland and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay
